scripts.build: pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter dashboard build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter api lint && pnpm --filter dashboard lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter api lint:fix && pnpm --filter dashboard lint:fix
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter api type-check && pnpm --filter dashboard type-check
scripts.check-all: pnpm type-check && pnpm lint && pnpm format:check && pnpm build
scripts.check-dev: pnpm --filter @opti-llm/api dev --dry-run 2>&1 || echo 'API dev check completed'
